content_summary: The presentation discusses the concept of morphogenetic systems and cellular networks in the context of bioelectricity. It explores how cells, though individually unaware, collectively form structures like limbs. The speaker also discusses the role of oncogenes in tumor development, where cells disconnect electrically from the rest of the network, perceiving the body as an external environment.
